column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Best ramen in Houston. But Tiger Den is a very close second
column2: so whichever you prefer will depend on your tastes and how much you're willing to pay. For me
column3: Jinya takes it with better broth
column5: and chashu pork. The two are really in a league of their own here
column6: and so I'm only going to write a comparison with Tiger Den.
